scripts.install_clean_boundle: yarn install && yarn clean && yarn workspace env_def build
scripts.prepare: husky install && echo install_finish && yarn workspace support build
scripts.build:web: yarn workspace api build && yarn workspace web build
scripts.winBuild:web: yarn workspace api winBuild && yarn workspace web winBuild
scripts.build:app: yarn build:web && yarn workspace sirius-desktop build
scripts.test:edm:test: yarn workspace env_def build edm_test mac && yarn build:web && yarn workspace sirius-desktop dev:prod
scripts.test:edm:test1: yarn workspace env_def build edm_test1 mac && yarn build:web && yarn workspace sirius-desktop dev:prod
scripts.test:edm:prod: yarn workspace env_def build edm_test_prod mac && yarn build:web && yarn workspace sirius-desktop dev:prod
scripts.test:edm:prev: yarn workspace env_def build edm_prev mac && yarn build:web && yarn workspace sirius-desktop dev:prod
scripts.test:test: yarn workspace env_def build test mac && yarn build:web && yarn workspace sirius-desktop dev
scripts.test:test1: yarn workspace env_def build test1 mac && yarn build:web && yarn workspace sirius-desktop dev
scripts.test:test2: yarn workspace env_def build test2 mac && yarn build:web && yarn workspace sirius-desktop dev:prod
scripts.test:prod: yarn workspace env_def build test_prod mac && yarn build:web && yarn workspace sirius-desktop dev:prod
scripts.test:prev: yarn workspace env_def build prev mac && yarn build:web && yarn workspace sirius-desktop dev:prod
scripts.build:test: yarn build:test:win && yarn build:test:win32 && yarn build:test:mac
scripts.build:dev: yarn build:dev:win && yarn build:dev:win32 && yarn build:dev:mac
scripts.build:prev: yarn build:prev:win && yarn build:prev:win32 && yarn build:prev:mac
scripts.build:prod: yarn build:prod:win && yarn build:prod:win32 && yarn build:prod:mac
scripts.clean: find ./ -type d -path "*packages/*/dist" -and -not -path "*packages/*/node_modules/*" -delete && find ./ -type d -path "*packages/*/src/gen" -delete && rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules/.cache && rm -rf packages/electron*/releases-*/* && yarn workspace web clean && yarn workspace web-entry-wm clean && yarn workspace web-entry-ff clean && yarn workspace sirius-desktop clean && rm -rf  packages/web-ui/api_dist
scripts.winClean: rm -r -fo packages/*/dist; rm -r -fo node_modules/.cache; rm -r -fo packages/*/node_modules/.cache; rm -r -fo packages/electron*/releases-*/*; yarn workspace web clean; yarn workspace sirius-desktop clean
scripts.clean:upgrade: rm -rf web/node_modules; rm -rf wb-entry-wm/node_module; rm -rf web-entry-ff/node_module; rm -rf web-preview/node_modules; rm -rf node_modules
